title: kavalaippaDuvadEnO
sahitya:
kavalaippaDuvadEnO savalai manamE karuNAkaran kAppAn unaiyE


anupallavi

  avalai ninaittu verum umiyai iDikkAdE aruL mozhi kELAmal agarAdi paDikkAdE


caraNam    nAn irukka bhayam En  ena navinravan nADiya varam tarat-tEDi mun ninravan 
jnAnap-paraman sannidAnam un uLLamE nanrAit-teLindAl idai onrAi inburalAmE
